codeantai.pythonDocstringFormat:
"""{Short one sentence description of function}
Parameters:
    - param1 (type): Short Description of param1.
    - param2 (type): Short Description of param2, if applicable.
Returns:
    - type: Short Description of the return value.
Example:
    - Write only one example of sample input and sample output function(sample_input) -> sample_output
    - This example should try to mock the input schema and output schema with relevant values
"""
codeantai.javascriptDocstringFormat:
/**
* Brief description of the function in one line
* @example
* functionName(sample_arg1, sample_arg2)
* some sample return value
* @param {type} {Argument} - Argument description in one line.
* @returns {type} Return description in one line.
* @description
*   - Only write non obvious things about the function.
*   - Do not write things that are explained above in the function description or inputs.
*   - Never write more than 4 points.
*/
